column5: I have been himm,n and haa,n about getting a new diggy cam. Not pleased with my pics from my old cam,and Im sure the members here would like to see some better clearer pics. Today I got a nice new 8 pix cammy from my sweet heart   and cant wait to use it. It,s alot more complicated then my old one, so it may take sometome to get it right.
just don't drop it down the hole on saturday    while out fishing
Now that you have lost the LBs she might want you to pose like the pic Terry made in the other thread, hence the new cam....
She dont need pics,as she get,s to see it all the time
Take lots of photos, and then try to learn from them. Practice. Practise. Practise. And ya, don't drop it down the hole ...   or next to the dock.
Brian is going fishing   Take cover, something baaaad is going to happen!!!!  Sinker
Ya care to sit and jig with me  my son and split on a bottle of screech and some stories?
whew I thought the wife finally got you that manzerre lol
I'd love to man, but I work EVERY weekend!!  Good luck,  Sinker
